pages.text: $(li)The Mushroom Fields is a rarely found biome composed mostly of Mycelium and Mushrooms.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find Red Mushrooms, Brown Mushrooms, Mycelium and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sugar_cane)Sugar Cane$(/l).

$(li)Some creatures such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/mooshroom)Mooshrooms$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/warpbeetle)Warpbeetles$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/mungus)Mungus$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Mushroom Field$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
